item.title: Vikingland
item.dc:creator: Trond | StakeNordic.com
item.description:
Vikingland

Vikingland is a NFT marketplace initially started as a side project to rewards stakers on www.stakenordic.com. It’s now being developed on it’s own and currently has automatic orders in place. Future features will be profiles for selling/creating users own NFTs. NFTs are marked with the wallet address of the buyer and minting of the NFTs will be done when Babylon is released and it’s technically possible. Payment in the marketplace acceps $XRD and $VKC. $VKC is the VikingCoin being airdropped for stakers on www.stakenordic.com

The NFT collection currently live is the “Viking Warrior”, but more NFTs will be produced. Eventually users can add and sell their own.

Price of each NFT: 15 XRD

Links:

  • Website

Social:

  • Twitter
  • Telegram

1 post - 1 participant

Read full topic

item.description:
Radix Panda

Radix Panda is a NFT collection of 10 000 unique Pandas. The OG Pandas live in China, but this one is at home on the Radix DLT. They are cute and the charm of the charismatic megafauna definitely shows – our community is proof of that.

item.title: Roidboiz
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Roidboiz

9,936 unique Roidboiz loyal to DogeCube, the original Radix memecoin. They are the first of the Gangs of Radix, and occupy the farthest shards of the 2^256 Radix Shardspace.
The official website with more information will be launched later in Q1 2022.

In the meantime we are running a Pre-launch Sale: - 10% of Supply Available (993 Roidboiz) - Price: 100XRD or 200,000DGC (Max 25 Roidz per wallet for pre-launch)
DGC price will only be available for 993 Roidboiz, including pre launch sales. Price after official launch: 200XRD or 400,000DGC.

The Roidboiz were inspired by the DogeCube Meme Brawls. They are hand sketched and digitally optimised using a combination of Procreate and Photoshop.

Price of each NFT: PRESALE: 100 XRD / 200,000 DGC

Links:

  • Website

Social:

  • Twitter
  • Telegram

item.title: Alpha Radish NFT Series
item.dc:creator: Hans
item.description:
Alpha Radish NFT is the first product of the Radish Platform. A 10,000 unique Radishes designed to act as a “keycard” for holders and collectors to unlock special features on the Radish Platform that will be built on the RADIX DLT.

UTILITIES: TBA
PRICE: TBA

BRIEF SUMMARY OF RADISH PLATFORM:
An emerging all-in-one ecosystem that will be built on RADIX DLT. It primarily act as a gateway for Radish token holders to enjoy perks and benefit, a platform for NFT Creators to unleash their inner creativity and for Game Developers to cultivate their ideas.

LINKS:
Website: TBA

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Radish_Root
Telegram: Telegram: Contact @radishroot

item.title: Spike Bros
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Spike Bros

In 1995, the Cactus Space Agency, launched 10000 cactus into space as an experiment. Little would they know, radiations transformed them into weird creatures. Spike Bros is an art NFT consisting of 10000 randomly generated space cacti.

Price of each NFT: 40 XRD or equivalent in DGC

item.title: Amazed Retro Techzillas
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Amazed Retro Techzillas

Pixelart. 3000x3000px. Collection of 10 000 unique NFTs. Amazed Retro Techzilla is the official mascot of the ART token.

Collection is in final design stage. Suggestions for traits are possible and more than welcomed.

$ART shareholders are eligible for dividends (in $XRD) from this collection sales. First dividend payments on 31.3.2022.

How to become a shareholder.

Reservation

Reservations are open for random allocation and unlimited until the marketplace opens. You will receieve a placeholder token.

Once on the marketplace, sales are available trough direct orders, but limited to a selection of 100 Techzillas per day.

Reservations address

For pre-order, please send 100 XRD or multiples of 100 XRD to:
rdx1qsppry9mz3jq3hn6ymh45urktsy7vmwenhq930r4eprgqadp9snucugrjvj87

Price of each NFT: 100 XRD

Links:

  • Website
  • Contact prints preview

  • @Artistizen

item.title: Radix Ratz
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Radix Ratz

The Radix Ratz live deep in the sewers of London, they sneaked out of the Radix Labs following Mainnet launch in 2021 and they will soon be ready for new homes.
This is you chance to be part of the Radix team in one of the first NFT projects launching on this ground breaking technology. There will only be 10 000 Ratz minted, and our token is the RATZ token.

Price of each NFT: 50 XRD

item.title: Radical Penguins
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Radical Penguins

Radical Penguins claims the glory of being the first 3D NTF and Penguin collection on Radix. Each of the 10,000 unique Penguins in our colony was crafted with love, care and dedication so that they have their own identity, personality and charm.
Radical in looks, passion and humour, sometimes peculiar, sometimes lovable, and sometimes outright weird, there is a Penguin for everybody!

Established in January 2022 by two childhood friends that came together to create the next level of NFT art on RADIX. One is a world class designer and founder of a New York based creative agency, the other is a technologist with a deep passion for Radix, based in UK.

Price of each NFT: 175 XRD (will increase as supply decreases)

Links:

  • Website

Social:

  • Twitter
  • Telegram

item.title: Radthings
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Radthings

Radthings live in the Radiverse of Radix DLT. 10,000 original NFTs inspired by the Radix community which can be reserved now in advance of Radix Babylon release.

Reservations made by sending XRD to either the lucky dip or choose specific wallets, are received in the form of Radthings tokens (ticker: THING). These can be used to claim the corresponding NFT after Radix Babylon is launched. For more information check the website.

Some Radthings have rare accessories relating to the growing Radiverse. Check out the list of accessories that are considered rare here!

Price of each NFT: 20 to 30 XRD

Links:

  • Website

Social:

  • Twitter
  • Telegram

RadApes

First and coolest apes on Radix!

RadApes is an NFT series featuring 10,000 AI-generated apes. RadApes are looking to make trouble on our DLT from January 2022 until we reach DAO singularity. Rad in looks and behaviour, these apes will stop for nobody. Stay hungry - stay apish

item.title: Radogs
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Radogs

Radog NFTs are created by two Radix enthusiasts. It started with the desire to make full use of the Radix network and to test it out. What better way to explore the Radix universe than with the most loyal NFT ever made on the Radix network by your side: The Radog. Radogs come in many forms and with many accessories. For every taste, their is a loyal companion. Woof!

ONLY 10.000 RADOGS CREATED
No more, no less. There will never be a second batch. Make sure to get all the Radogs you want before they run out.

INTEGRATED WITH THE RADIX WALLET
Our reservation and minting system is fully integrated and automated with the Radix network and wallet.

UNLIMITED RESERVATIONS
No limit on the reservation amount due to the automated nature. We want to strive to make full use of the Radix network.

Price of each NFT: 25 XRD

Links:

  • Website
  • Store

Social:

  • Twitter

1 post - 1 participant

Read full topic

item.title: About the NFTs category
item.dc:creator: Stuart | RadixPool
item.description:
WARNING: Until Babylon is released, all you’re buying is a token that you may or may not be able to swap for an NFT in the future. As always, do your own research!

This category will be used as a showcase for NFTs on the Radix Ledger.

You can find a list with a small summary here, and you can get your own NFT added by following the instructions written here.

Only moderators can create threads, but everyone can post and comment.

1 post - 1 participant

Read full topic

item.description:
Want to get your NFT listed in our list and have your own thread?

item.title: Badix Universe
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Badix Universe

In response to the many NFT-based projects launched on Radix the Badix Universe has been created: a virtual economy/universe simulation game on the Radix ledger dedicated to providing NFTs with utility-based value! To kick off the project, 5000 unique playable NFTs have been generated.

item.title: Root Materials
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
Root Materials

Root Materials is a collection of 200 unique 3D renders of the Radix symbol inspired by the first ever Radix NFT.

There is no intentional rarity, although there are some techniques or elements you may see more frequently and some only once such as generative styles, hairs, particles, metals, and emitters and bump/displacement affected materials. There are some Easter Eggs and sets distributed throughout too!

Price of each NFT: 250 XRD

item.title: xrdGlory
item.dc:creator: Mattia | MattiaNode
item.description:
xrdGlory

How high do you think the price of XRD will go?
A new kind of NFT project that depends on the price of XRD. Reaching set price levels triggers the generation of unique art.

Price of each NFT: Depends on how high you think XRD will go! Starting from 15 XRD for a price point of $10, to 125 XRD for a price point of $0.7
